title._content: Confederate veterans at the 50th Reunion of the battle, held in Gettysburg in 1913. The National Photo Company news service posed a group from North Carolina with their Tar Heel banner (LOC)

description._content: C.S.A. Veterans, Gettysburg, Pa., 1913 1913. 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the National Photo Company on the negative or negative sleeve. 50th Reunion of Gettysburg veterans. Photo shows North Carolina "Tar Heel State" banner displayed. Gift; Herbert A. French; 1947. This glass negative might show streaks and other blemishes resulting from a natural deterioration in the original coatings. Subjects: United States--Pennsylvania--Gettysburg. Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA Part Of: National Photo Company Collection (Library of Congress) Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/npcc.28215 Call Number: LC-F81- 44564
